import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import Customer_layout from '../../../pages/customer_layout'; const Cart = () => { const [ cart, setCart ] = useState(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cart'))); const a = 0; const onDelete = (index) => { const result = cart.splice(1,index); setCart(result); console.log(result); if (result === []) { localStorage.setItem('cart', []); } else { localStorage.setItem('cart', JSON.stringify(result)); } } useEffect(() => { const b = 0; for(let product of cart){ b += parseInt(product.price); console.log(product); console.log(b); } }, []) const section = <>
Home / Cart
{cart.map((product, index) => { return( ) })}
Image Product Price Quantity Total Remove
{product.name} {product.price} {product.count} {product.count * product.price}

Enter your coupon code if you have one.

Cart Totals

Total
return ( <> ) } export default Cart
